name: Bunny Hop
description: A simple platformer about a rabbit, which needs to collect carrots in order to move to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 134 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or higer Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 134 MB available space
